data.name: NotiVR
data.detailed_description:
READ BEFORE PURCHASING

***IMPORTANT PLEASE READ***

NotiVR only works with Android phones. iOS support is not available yet, do not purchase if you have an iPhone. See system requirements for more information.


About the Software

NotiVR (previously PhoneLink VR) is a super simple app that makes it easy to stay connected in VR.

Using NotiVR you can see a live feed of notifications from your Android and reply to messages without removing your headset (reply function requires compatible phone and support may vary per app)

Setup is simple, just download the NotiVR Android app and scan the pairing code. Your phone will automatically send any notifications to SteamVR. Plus you can check your notification history at any time without taking your headset off using our custom SteamVR dashboard overlay.

Features

  • Seamless notification mirroring from your Android device
  • Reply to texts from most messaging apps without removing your VR headset (Android 7.0+ required, apps that support inline replies are supported)
  • Supports XSOverlay notifications (Requries purchase of XSOverlay)
  • Quick and easy setup process
  • Desktop control panel with notification history and pairing controls
  • See your notification history in SteamVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 4GB / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: An Android phone running Android 6.0 (Marshmallow) or greater is required
